channels.name: rules
channels.topic: ğŸ“œ Community guidelines

fields.name: 1. Be Professional
fields.value: Maintain a respectful, professional tone. No harassment or discrimination.

fields.name: 2. Stay On Topic
fields.value: Use appropriate channels for your messages. Off-topic goes in #off-topic.

fields.name: 3. No Spam/Self-Promo
fields.value: No unsolicited promotion. Share in #showcase if relevant to the product.

fields.name: 4. Search Before Asking
fields.value: Check #faq and #docs before asking in support. It might already be answered!

fields.name: 5. Report Issues Properly
fields.value: Use #bug-reports with reproduction steps. Vague reports are hard to fix.

fields.name: 6. Respect Privacy
fields.value: Don't share private conversations, API keys, or personal data in public channels.

channels.topic: ğŸ“‹ Frequently asked questions â€” check here first!

fields.name: How do I get started?
fields.value: Check our docs at #docs for quickstart guides.

fields.name: How do I upgrade my plan?
fields.value: Visit your dashboard â†’ Settings â†’ Billing.

fields.name: How do I report a bug?
fields.value: Post in #bug-reports with steps to reproduce.

fields.name: How do I request a feature?
fields.value: Post in #feature-requests and vote on others!

fields.name: Where is the API docs?
fields.value: Check #docs for the full API reference.

fields.name: I need urgent help!
fields.value: Enterprise users: open a #tickets. Others: post in #support.
